explanation: [0-0] A woman in a blue top sits at a wooden table. She holds a bottle of red nail polish in her left hand and a nail brush in her right, ready to paint her nails.

After finishing, she holds her hand in front of the camera and takes off the black glove, revealing her left hand. She looks angrily at the unevenly painted nails. Then, a hand holding a pink makeup sponge appears, and the other hand applies blue nail polish to it. A blue blanket can be seen in the background.
